title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 500.3 - Reimbursement for expenditures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 500.3 - Reimbursement for expenditures

State Regulations

Except as otherwise provided by the Social Services Law, expenditures for medical care shall be eligible for reimbursement, provided
such expenditures are made and reimbursement therefor claimed in accordance
with the rules of the board and such regulations as have been established, or
may hereafter be established, by the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
500.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
